name: FMOD & Unity Audio Tech Demo
description:
This is a game I did as a part of Udemy's "Complete C# Unity Developer 3D: Learn to Code Making Games" course.

I decided to take the opportunity and learn FMOD implementation and scripting from scratch and also use it as a showreel of sorts.

I also learned a lot about working in Unity, some animation basics, level design and of course programming.

In the future I'll be making a video elaborating more on whats going on in FMOD and the script side of things.
